channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Please can someone clean this up vermin are now appearing thank you, 11th October
item.description:
This was sent to tfl who refused to deal with the on going problem of rubbish accumilating on the roundabout there has now been sittings of vermin because of it . please can someone from the council have a clean sweep there thank you

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lea Bridge Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: White van not moved near tennis court, 11th October
item.description:
The van has been parked outside Woodlands/ Linda Court for several weeks now. It hasn’t been cleaned or moved. The bumper is falling apart which indicates its probably abandoned.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): South Hill Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Small dead tree, 11th October
item.description:

item.title: Drain blocked, 11th October
item.description:
This, as you can see in the picture, has accumulated over the last 2 years. I have reported this many times and it's still a problem. I rent a garage here and when it rains this area floods. It is covered in deep moss and garage access is a problem when flooded.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Robin Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet
